meanings.sent1: She is geekier than her brother when it comes to computers.
meanings.sent2: The new Star Wars movie is geekier than the previous one.
meanings.sent3: His geekier side comes out when he talks about coding.
meanings.sent4: The convention was a geekier experience than she had expected.
meanings.sent5: The geekier the topic, the more excited he becomes.

meanings.sent1: Today's comic book is geekier than yesterday's.
meanings.sent2: She felt geekier after attending the science fiction convention.
meanings.sent3: His outfit for the cosplay contest couldn't get any geekier.
meanings.sent4: The debate on sci-fi movies got geekier as it progressed.
meanings.sent5: The room became geekier with every new piece of tech added.
